languages.text: "Ты — контрабандистка и еретичка. Ковыляй, пока ноги не сломали".
"You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."
languages.original_text: "Ты — контрабандистка и еретичка. Ковыляй, пока ноги не сломали".

traits.locale_text: "You are a smuggler and a heretic. Get going or we'll break your legs."
"You are a smuggler and a heretic. Get going or we'll break your legs."
"You are a smuggler and a heretic. Get going or we'll break your legs."
"You are a smuggler and a heretic. Get going or we'll break your legs."
"You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."
"You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."

languages.text: “你是个走私犯，还是个异端分子。赶紧走，否则打断你的腿。”
languages.original_text: "You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."

traits.locale_text: “你是个走私犯，还是个异端分子。赶紧过来，否则打断你的腿。”

languages.text: 「お前は密輸者で異端者だ。早く去れ。さもないとお前の脚をへし折るぞ」
languages.original_text: "You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は密輸者で異端者だ。早く去れ。さもないとお前の脚をへし折るぞ」

languages.text: «Es un contrabandista y un hereje. En marcha, o le rompemos las piernas».
languages.original_text: "You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."

traits.locale_text: «Es un contrabandista y un hereje. En marcha o le romperemos las piernas».

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein Schmuggler und ein Ketzer. Los jetzt, sonst brechen wir Euch die Beine."
languages.original_text: "You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein Schmuggler und ein Ketzer. Los jetzt, sonst brechen wir Euch die Beine."

languages.text: « Vous êtes un trafiquant et un hérétique. Maintenant, avancez, ou on vous brise les jambes. »
languages.original_text: "You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes un trafiquant et un hérétique. Avancez, ou on vous brise les jambes. »

languages.text: "Sen bir kaçakçı ve kâfirsin. Yürü yoksa bacaklarını kırarız."
languages.original_text: "You are a smuggler and a heretic. Now move, or we'll break your legs."

traits.locale_text: "Sen bir kaçakçı ve bir kâfirsin. Yürü yoksa bacaklarını kırarız."
